channel.title: Really need Help!
channel.description:
Look, i have got latest java but I have a error with client! When i run client it says: Exception in therad "main" java.lang.NoClassDefError: EGUI
Inside run.bat- @ECHO OFF TITLE Client JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI PAUSE
I thought i had to edit EGUI.txt but i dont know... Please help...
btw sorry I didn't notice that there are rule like this

item.title: Really need Help!
item.dc:creator: @scriptz scriptz
item.description:
@scriptz wrote:

[quote=“dragonchain, post:5, topic:162933”][quote author=scriptz link=topic=221530.msg1916738#msg1916738 date=1196970518]

Uhm… you should put the EGUI.java back to what it was and compile?

Edit: [quote author=Coldbloodio link=topic=221530.msg1916733#msg1916733 date=1196970274]
Double post? replace your run.bat with [code]@echo off

java -Xmx800M server

pause[/code]

He didn’t double post??
[/quote]
I compiled it 2 times, and with EGUI, I didn’t edit that…
[/quote]Did you edit your compiler or edited anything last or deleted the egui?[/quote]

I didn’t edit those files… it happined with all my clients

Read full topic

item.title: Really need Help!
item.dc:creator: @scriptz scriptz
item.description:
@scriptz wrote:

Look, i have got latest java but I have a error with client!
When i run client it says:
Exception in therad “main” java.lang.NoClassDefError: EGUI

Inside run.bat-
@ECHO OFF
TITLE Client
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI
PAUSE

I thought i had to edit EGUI.txt but i dont know…
Please help…

btw sorry I didn’t notice that there are rule like this

Read full topic
